title: Handkerchief, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, couching and eyelet stitches with areas of deflected element work and cutwork with needle lace insertions on a plain weave foundation
description: Handkerchief with embroidered border of rectangular shapes and floral sprays.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 1900–50.Medium: cotton on linen
Technique: satin, stem, couching and eyelet stitches with areas of deflected element work and cutwork with needle lace insertions on a plain weave foundation. Gift of Stanley Herzman. 1976-92-9.
